privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This notice explains how Aumatex srls processes personal data in compliance with GDPR (EU) 2016/679 and applicable Italian law.
privacy.controllerContent: Aumatex srls · Via Umberto Biancamano, 25 · 00185 Roma (RM) · info@aumatex.it · aumatex@pec.it · +39 351 8860030.
privacy.legalContent: Processing is based on Articles 6(1)(b), 6(1)(c) and 6(1)(f) GDPR for service delivery, legal compliance and legitimate interest in security and site operation.

dataPoints.navigation: Technical navigation data (IP address, device/browser info, timestamps) generated by access logs for security and performance.
dataPoints.contacts: Contact details and message content you provide (name, email, phone, company, requested service) when you reach us.
dataPoints.cookies: Cookie preferences saved locally and technical cookies issued by the hosting provider (Aruba Business) necessary to serve the site.

purposesPoints.browsing: Allow browsing of the site and deliver requested pages and assets.
purposesPoints.contact: Respond to information, commercial or support requests you submit.
purposesPoints.security: Protect the platform, detect anomalies or abuse, and maintain service continuity.
purposesPoints.compliance: Fulfil legal obligations and manage any defensive needs.

privacy.retentionContent: Technical logs are kept only for the time needed to ensure security and diagnostics (normally up to 12 months). Contact requests are retained for the time strictly necessary to handle the conversation and up to 24 months for traceability. Cookie consent choices are stored for up to 12 months.
privacy.hostingContent: The site is hosted on Aruba Business (Linux) within the EU. Aruba may set only technical cookies for load balancing and security. No analytics, marketing or profiling cookies are enabled and data are not shared for advertising purposes.
privacy.transfersContent: Data are stored in the EU. If future transfers outside the EU/EEA become necessary, they will follow adequacy decisions or standard contractual clauses in line with GDPR.

rightsPoints.access: Access to your personal data and information about processing.
rightsPoints.rectification: Rectification of inaccurate data and completion of incomplete data.
rightsPoints.erasure: Erasure ("right to be forgotten") within the limits of law.
rightsPoints.restriction: Restriction of processing in the cases provided for by Article 18 GDPR.
rightsPoints.portability: Portability of data you provided, in a structured, commonly used format.
rightsPoints.objection: Objection to processing based on legitimate interest, including security monitoring.
rightsPoints.complaint: Lodge a complaint with the Italian Data Protection Authority (Garante per la protezione dei dati personali).

privacy.exerciseContent: You can write to info@aumatex.it or aumatex@pec.it, or call +39 351 8860030. We will respond as soon as possible and, in any case, within the terms set by GDPR.
privacy.securityContent: We adopt technical and organizational measures proportionate to the risks (TLS encryption, access control, least-privilege accounts, monitored backups) to safeguard data.
privacy.updatesContent: We may update this privacy notice to reflect legal or technical changes. Last update: 11/03/2026.

aboutPage.title: About
aboutPage.heroTitle: Product squads that drive digital transformation
aboutPage.heroSubtitle: One ownership for strategy, design, engineering and governance: we build scalable platforms and services with clear metrics and reliable delivery.
aboutPage.trustPoint1: End-to-end teams that accelerate go-live without sacrificing quality.
aboutPage.trustPoint2: Governance, security and compliance integrated from design.
aboutPage.trustPoint3: Co-creation with business and IT stakeholders for measurable outcomes.
aboutPage.missionTitle: Robust, measurable and scalable digital products
aboutPage.missionSubtitle: We blend discovery, design and engineering to turn processes and services into premium experiences with focus on security, performance and growth.
aboutPage.missionPoint1Copy: Roadmaps driven by KPIs, risk analysis and business priorities.
aboutPage.missionPoint2Copy: Research, UX/UI and omnichannel journeys for consistent experiences.
aboutPage.missionPoint3Copy: Cloud-native architectures, DevSecOps and real-time observability.
aboutPage.capabilitiesSubtitle: Product owners, designers, engineers, data and security specialists working together to ship enterprise solutions.
aboutPage.capability1Copy: Workshops, UX research and clickable prototypes to validate directions and reduce risk.
aboutPage.capability2Copy: Microservices, API-first, AI integration and CI/CD pipelines with security baked in.
aboutPage.capability3Copy: KPI monitoring, A/B testing and operational runbooks shared with client teams.
aboutPage.timelineTitle: A clear path: from vision to rollout
aboutPage.timelineSubtitle: Every phase is guided by metrics, stakeholder validation and incremental releases.
aboutPage.step1Copy: Goals, risks, stakeholders and preliminary architecture.
aboutPage.step2Copy: UX, UI, prototypes and continuous validation with users and business.
aboutPage.step3Copy: Modular development, API-first, observability and quality engineering.
aboutPage.step4Copy: Controlled releases, KPI measurement, continuous improvements and support.
aboutPage.ctaTitle: Co-design the next release with your team
aboutPage.ctaSubtitle: From discovery to rollout: dedicated squads, shared governance and KPI-driven roadmap.

cookie.descrizione: We use cookies to improve your experience. Choose what to enable.
cookie.essenzialiDescrizione: Required for the site to work and cannot be disabled.
cookie.analisiDescrizione: Help us understand how the site is used.

cookiePolicy.introduzione: This cookie policy describes how Aumatex srls uses cookies on this site hosted on Aruba Business (Linux).
cookiePolicy.titolareDescrizione: Aumatex srls · Via Umberto Biancamano, 25 · 00185 Roma (RM) · info@aumatex.it · aumatex@pec.it · +39 351 8860030.
cookiePolicy.cheCosaDescrizione: Cookies are small text files that websites store on your device to provide or improve a service. This site uses them in compliance with GDPR, the Italian Data Protection Authority's guidelines and the ePrivacy rules.
cookiePolicy.cookieTecniciPunto1: Navigation and session cookies to deliver pages, maintain language preferences and ensure basic functionality.
cookiePolicy.cookieTecniciPunto2: Security and load-balancing cookies issued by the hosting provider (Aruba) to protect the infrastructure and distribute traffic.
cookiePolicy.cookieTecniciPunto3: A consent cookie that stores your choices from the banner for up to 12 months.
cookiePolicy.cookieTecniciPunto4: No analytics, marketing or profiling cookies are enabled on this site.
cookiePolicy.profilazioneDescrizione: We do not use third-party marketing platforms, pixels or advertising networks. The only third party involved is Aruba Business as hosting provider, limited to technical cookies.
cookiePolicy.consensoDescrizione: Essential cookies are always active because they are necessary for the site to operate. The banner lets you accept or reject optional categories; since no optional cookies are active, your choice mainly concerns the storage of consent itself.
cookiePolicy.gestioneDescrizione: You can reopen the cookie banner at any time from the footer link "Cookie preferences" and update your consent.
cookiePolicy.browserDescrizione: You can delete or block cookies from your browser settings (e.g., Safari, Chrome, Edge, Firefox). Blocking technical cookies may prevent the site from working correctly.
cookiePolicy.dirittiDescrizione: To exercise your privacy rights or obtain more information, contact info@aumatex.it or see the Privacy Policy.
